body_html:
It seems Pi zero is hopeless.
I followed all the steps again and it works just like johnnymakk said.

but when I run the line
make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile

I got error

pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow $ tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/bin/label_image
Illegal instruction

Tensorflow seems cannot install on ARM V6

pls sir @drpngx ,Would you mind testing tensorflow with pi zero

body:
It seems Pi zero is hopeless.
I followed all the steps again and it works just like johnnymakk said.

but when I run the line
`make -f tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/Makefile`

I got error 

```
pi@raspberrypi:~/tensorflow $ tensorflow/contrib/pi_examples/label_image/gen/bin/label_image
Illegal instruction
```

Tensorflow seems cannot install on ARM V6 

pls sir @drpngx ,Would you mind testing tensorflow with pi zero
